com.noelios.restlet.ext.javamail
Class JavaMailClient

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.connector.AbstractConnector
      com.noelios.restlet.ext.javamail.JavaMailClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, Connector, Element, UniformInterface
public class JavaMailClient
extends AbstractConnector
implements Client

Client connector to a mail server.
Currently only the SMTP protocol is supported.
To send an email, specify a SMTP URI as the ressource reference of the call and use an XML email as the content of the call.

Sample XML email:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8851-1" ?>
<email>
  <header>
    <subject>Account activation</subject>
    <from>support@restlet.com</from>
    <to>user@domain.com</to>
    <cc>log@restlet.com</cc>
  </header>
  <body><![CDATA[Your account was sucessfully created!]]></body>
</email>
